inclusion.criterion: Symptomatic moderate-to-severe (3+) or severe (4+) mitral valve regurgitation (DMR)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: NYHA functional class II, III, IV.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Anatomically suitable for transcatheter mitral valve repair by edge-to-edge technique,
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: and can be treated by the DragonflyTM device, as assessed by the site investigators
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: and confirmed by the echo core laboratory and eligibility committee.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: High surgical risk as defined by either Society for Thoracic Surgery Risk Calculator score for valve replacement ≥ 8 points; or STS score for valve repair ≥ 6 points; or other high surgical risks.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Transseptal catheterization and femoral vein access is determined to be feasible.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The subject or subject's legal representative has been informed of the nature of the trial, willing to accept the experimental tests, and has provided written informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Echocardiographic evidence of intra-cardiac mass, thrombus, or vegetation.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: The presence of other severe heart valve disease requiring surgical intervention.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prior mitral valve leaflet surgery or transcatheter mitral valve intervention.
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Estimated pulmonary artery systolic pressure (PASP) > 70 mm Hg assessed by echocardiography.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of acute myocardial infarction in the prior 4 weeks or untreated clinically significant coronary artery disease requiring revascularization.
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has Marfan's syndrome and known severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation, who was planned for a MV repair but was lost to follow-up. She remains symptomatic and is now prepared to undergo mitral valve repair/replacement surgery.
